tool_description: Validates extracted text fields against expected formats, patterns, and business rules for document authenticity.

extracted_fields.description: Array of field values extracted from the document

field_names.description: Array of field names corresponding to extracted values

country_code.description: ISO country code for locale-specific validation rules

strict_validation.description: Whether to apply strict format validation rules

error_messages: Field count mismatch: The number of field names must match the number of extracted fields.
Invalid document type: Document type must be specified and recognized by the system.
Unsupported country code: Use a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
Empty field data: At least one field value must be provided for validation.
usage: Provide document type, extracted field values, and corresponding field names. The tool validates each field against expected patterns and formats.

validation_results.description: Boolean array indicating validation success for each field

error_details.description: Detailed error messages for failed validations
